original_text: You shall be in charge of my palace, and all my people are to submit to your orders. Only with respect to the throne will I be greater than you.”
korean_text: 너는 내 집을 다스리라 내 백성이 다 네 명령에 복종하리니 내가 너보다 높은 것은 내 왕좌뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: You shall be in charge of my palace
and all my people are to submit to your orders
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 모든 백성은 너의 명령에 복종할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Only with respect to the throne
will I be greater than you
